17  def test_lookup_table(self):

19  expected_angles = {
20  0.09: [-2.980615632032212, 1.0738193218849965, 3.1179111024732222, -0.22473504379450288, 0.5154332745047984, 1.6421765486826985, 0.10124582177772824],

24  }
25  for test in y_tests:
26  self.assertEquals(joint_lookup_table(test), expected_angles[test])

28  def test_home(self):
29  # wait for keep service to become available
30  rospy.wait_for_service("keep")
31  # call keep service
32  kpr = rospy.ServiceProxy("keep",Keeper)
33  resp = kpr(0.0)
34  self.assertEquals(1, resp.code.val)
35 
36  def test_keep(self):
